attributes.action: Scrap £120 million Brexit festival - use the money to reward our NHS instead.
attributes.additional_details: Half of the population did not want Brexit. Most of the population believe that the recent wage "increase" for the NHS and healthcare professionals are an insult.
attributes.background: We call on you to scrap the pantomime of a Brexit festival and give that £120 million to our deserving NHS instead.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel Festival UK* 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561772

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970
